entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Beauceville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:20 AM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow becoming mixed with rain this afternoon. Local snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this morning. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023
